articles.content: In the music world, it’s pretty much a given that the mellower the artist, the more troubled he or she may be — think of the demons lurking behind those all those languid guitar strums or yacht-rock … [+7162 chars]

articles.author: Adam S. Levy
articles.title: Post Malone says he's going to be a father for the first time: 'I'm excited for this next chapter' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 26-year-old rapper said, 'I'm excited for this next chapter in my life, I'm the happiest I've ever been, and for since I could remember I was sad.'
articles.content:
Post Malone says he's going to be a father with his longtime love.

articles.title: Daniel Radcliffe goes full sex symbol in first Weird Al biopic teaser - The Verge
articles.description: In the first trailer for Roku’s upcoming Weird Al Yankovic biopic starring Daniel Radcliffe, the young musician finds his voice and then some.
articles.content: Amazingly, every word in that headline is true
